thread.title: Peggy Noonan’s Education in News Craft
thread.title_full: Peggy Noonan’s Education in News Craft - WSJ

author: Peggy Noonan
title: Peggy Noonan’s Education in News Craft
text:
I was immensely fortunate to be at a CBS station and then the network in the 1970s. I was allowed to become part of something new and untried but also to benefit from something old and hallowed. Through the first I got confidence, in the second some mastery of a craft.
At the station, WEEI in Boston, we were inventing news radio—local and national news on a 24-hour cycle, seven days a week. It was brand new. I was just out of college... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
